novels.title: Mother of Learning
novels.author: nobody103
novels.synopsis: Zorian is a teenage mage of humble birth and modest skill, attending his third year of education at Cyoria's magical academy. A month before the end of year exams, he finds himself trapped in a time loop, repeating the same month over and over again.

novels.title: Worm
novels.author: Wildbow
novels.synopsis: An introverted teenage girl with an unconventional superpower, Taylor goes out in costume to find escape from a deeply unhappy and frustrated civilian life. Her first attempt at taking down a supervillain sees her mistaken for one, thrusting her into the midst of the local 'cape' scene's politics, unwritten rules, and ambiguous morals.

novels.title: The Wandering Inn
novels.author: pirateaba
novels.synopsis: An inn is a place to rest, a ## place to talk and share stories, or a place to find adventures, bting., bting., bting., bting. welcome to the Wandering Inn.

novels.title: Worth the Candle
novels.author: Alexander Wales
novels.synopsis: Juniper Smith is a teenage dungeon master who finds himself transported into a world that is an amalgamation of every fictional world he ever created. Now he must survive and find meaning in a place built from his own imagination.

novels.title: Purple Days
novels.author: baurus
novels.synopsis: Joffrey Baratheon wakes up after his death, finding himself back at the beginning. Again. And again. A Song of Ice and Fire time loop fanfiction that transforms one of fiction's most hated characters.

novels.title: Tree of Aeons
novels.author: spaizzzer
novels.synopsis: Matt died. But he didn't stay dead. Instead, he woke up as a tree in a fantasy world. A tree with a System. Now he must grow, evolve, and build a forest kingdom while navigating the politics of gods and mortals alike.

novels.title: Azarinth Healer
novels.author: Rhaegar
novels.synopsis: A new world with near limitless possibilities. A healing class capable of dealing damage. A character who enjoys the simple pleasures of punching monsters in the face.

novels.title: The Perfect Run
novels.author: Void Herald
novels.synopsis: A dead man walks through a post-apocalyptic city, trying to survive while maintaining his deadpan humor. Each loop brings new challenges and reveals dark secrets about the world he's trying to save.
novels.editorNote: Deadpool-style humor meets time-loop survival — fast, sharp, and finished.

novels.title: Defiance of the Fall
novels.author: TheFirstDefier
novels.synopsis: The System arrived, and with it, a world changed. Animals mutated, dungeons appeared, and humanity was forced to adapt or die. Zac found himself in the middle of a dangerous forest, armed with nothing but a rusty knife and a desperate will to survive. Pure number-crunching satisfaction as cultivation meets System in an epic mashup.

novels.title: The Primal Hunter
novels.author: Zogarth
novels.synopsis: Earth is integrated into the Universal System. Monsters are real, and skills exist. Jake, a loner who prefers hunting in the wilderness, finds himself thrust into this new reality. As a lone wolf archer, he must evolve, kill, and grow stronger. A system apocalypse with faster pacing and focus on survival.

novels.title: Dungeon Crawler Carl
novels.author: Matt Dinniman
novels.synopsis: When Earth is turned into a dungeon by aliens, Carl and his ex-girlfriend's cat, Princess Donut, must survive. The #1 fan favorite of Royal Road — funnier, crazier, more heartbreaking. A man and his cat navigate a deadly dungeon livestream where anything goes.

novels.title: Beware of Chicken
novels.author: Casualfarmer
novels.synopsis: Bi De was a simple cultivator, until he died and was reborn as a simple chicken in a cultivation world. Instead of seeking power and dominance, he decides to farm and raise chickens. A cozy masterpiece that subverts xianxia tropes with wholesome rural life.

novels.title: The Last Angel
novels.author: Proximal Flame
novels.synopsis: Once, she was the flagship of the Compact's fleet. Then she was broken, her crew slaughtered, and left to drift. Now she awakens, and she wants revenge. A sentient warship tears through a galactic empire in this peak web sci-fi epic.

novels.title: Dungeon Keeper Ami
novels.author: Pusakuronu
novels.synopsis: Sailor Mercury is isekai'd into the world of Dungeon Keeper — as a Keeper herself. Armed with her magical genius and strategic mind, she must build dungeons while maintaining her moral compass. One of the longest-running tactical gems on SpaceBattles.

novels.title: Pale Lights
novels.author: ErraticErrata
novels.synopsis: In the city of Laure, power is everything. Noble houses vie for dominance, gangs rule the streets, and ancient horrors lurk beneath. A story of politics, ambition, and cosmic horror. If you loved Arcane's vibe, you'll love this — Lovecraft meets gang warfare meets noble academy.

novels.title: Dire Born
novels.author: Andrew Seiple
novels.synopsis: Born with powers that make her a monster in the eyes of the world, one woman chooses to become a villain. But not just any villain — she channels Doctor Doom's philosophy and presence. A female villain protagonist who conquers Amazon after rising from SpaceBattles forums.

novels.title: RE: Monarch
novels.author: J. McCoy
novels.synopsis: Elijah feels like he's died and gone to heaven. In this new world, he has power, magic, and the ability to make a difference. But the world is dangerous, and his second chance at life might be shorter than he thinks. A gritty time loop story with high stakes and meaningful progression.

novels.title: Sufficiently Advanced Magic
novels.author: Andrew Rowe
novels.synopsis: Corin Cadence always wanted to be a magic user. Unfortunately, in the world of Attis, magic is strictly controlled. But when he discovers a way to enter the prestigious magic academy of Mt. Thetis, he'll do whatever it takes to unlock the secrets of magic. Hard magic system with detailed crafting and progression.

novels.title: The Menocht Loop
novels.author: caerulex
novels.synopsis: What happens when you've already mastered the time loop? When you've already learned everything, seen everything, done everything? A unique take on the time loop genre following an overpowered protagonist trying to find meaning in endless repetition.

novels.title: Dear Spellbook
novels.author: Peter J. Lee
novels.synopsis: A D&D sorcerer finds himself trapped in a time loop, forced to rely on his magical journal to preserve his memories across iterations. A LitRPG mystery that combines D&D mechanics with compelling character development and puzzle-solving.
